description: React component VirtualClassroom providing a realtime classroom interface with participant list, connection status, and placeholder for immersive content. Uses custom hook useRealTime for realtime updates and Supabase environment variables.

methods.name: VirtualClassroom({ roomId, onSignal, children })
methods.description: React functional component managing classroom UI and realtime presence.

methods.name: handleRetry
methods.description: Reloads the page to retry connecting to the realtime channel.

methods.name: handleTestSignal
methods.description: Sends a test 'ping' signal via useRealTime hook.

ctags.name: VirtualClassroom
ctags.pattern: /^export default function VirtualClassroom({ roomId, onSignal, children }) {$/
